heroSubtitle: Join a team that takes IT seriously — and has fun doing it
intro: Quantum Harbour is growing, and we're always interested in talking to talented people who share our values. Whether we're actively hiring or not, we'd love to hear from you.

about.title: Who We Are
about.description: We're a managed service provider based in Ireland, supporting businesses across Ireland and the UK. We're small enough that everyone matters, but growing fast enough that there's real opportunity. Our team is made up of people who genuinely care about doing good work — not just closing tickets, but actually solving problems.

culture.title: No Blame Culture
culture.description: Mistakes happen. We focus on learning and fixing, not pointing fingers. If you broke it, you're probably the best person to fix it — and we'll help.

culture.title: Remote-Friendly
culture.description: We have an office, but we don't mandate attendance. Work from where you're most productive. We care about results, not presenteeism.

culture.title: Continuous Learning
culture.description: Technology moves fast. We invest in training, certifications, and giving people time to learn. If you want to grow, we'll support that.

culture.title: Honest Communication
culture.description: No corporate speak, no politics. We say what we mean and mean what we say — with clients and with each other.

roles.title: Types of Roles
roles.description: We typically hire for the following types of positions. Even if we're not actively recruiting, we're always happy to receive CVs from strong candidates.

types.title: MSP Engineer
types.description: The core of our service delivery. You'll handle escalated tickets, project work, and help maintain client environments. Strong Windows, networking, and troubleshooting skills required. Experience with RMM/PSA tools a plus.

types.title: Service Desk Analyst
types.description: First point of contact for client issues. You'll triage tickets, handle common requests, and escalate appropriately. Great communication skills and genuine desire to help people required.

types.title: Field Technician
types.description: On-site support for clients across Ireland. You'll handle hardware deployments, on-site troubleshooting, and be the face of Quantum Harbour at client locations. Clean driving licence required.

types.title: Security Specialist
types.description: Focus on security tooling, incident response, and helping clients improve their security posture. Experience with EDR, SIEM, and security frameworks required.

types.title: Software Developer
types.description: Building internal tools and client-facing products like qMechanic. Modern web technologies, API development, and database experience required.

benefits.title: What We Offer
items: Regular team events (optional, not forced fun)

cta.title: Interested?
cta.description: We're not always actively hiring, but we're always interested in meeting good people. Send us your CV and tell us a bit about yourself.
